snippet.title: Orcish Inn (Announcement Trailer)
snippet.description:
Vote for Orcish Inn on STEAM GREENLIGHT
http://steamcommunity.com/sharedfiles/filedetails/?id=320951828

Orcish Inn is an orc tavern simulation game for Windows, currently in development and created by Steven Colling and with sounds and music by Tilmann 'headchant' Hars. Raise crops, brew beer, build your tavern tile by tile and serve the incoming, orcish guests.

Official Website: http://orcish-inn.stevencolling.com
Community Hub with Votes and Contests: http://orcish-inn.stevencolling.com/hub.php
Follow Me on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/StevenColling
On IndieDB: http://www.indiedb.com/games/orcish-inn
